gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 123, Jazz 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Jazz, 123-107. Jayson Tatum recorded 38 points (13-25 FG) and six rebounds for the Celtics, while Derrick White added 24 points, six rebounds, three assists and three blocks in the victory. Keyonte George tallied 26 points (5-10 3pt. FG) and six assists for the Jazz in the losing effort. The Celtics are on a three-game win streak as they improve to 51-14 on the season, while the Jazz fall to 28-37.
